name: Shamrock
description: We’re currently looking for stakers to join the pool and help us reach our goal of 10 Million ADA Active Stake. We’re looking for investors who understand the benefits of Cardano and who seek a trusted & reliable Cardano pool to ensure continued profit from your valued stake. I am also giving back to the community with my work on PoolPeek.com where we aim to help everyone find the pool for them.Please connect to https://t.me/shamrockpool for the latest updates and discussions.
